column4: no one knows what I should do to run ZSNES (supernintendo emulator)?
does it say anything if you try to start it from a terminal?
btw your IRC client probably has auto completion so you can write my name with Ens<TAB>
(Thank you) I don't use the IRC program a lot....
I get the following msg "unable to poll /dev/input/event6. make sure you have read permissions to it.... (what do you think?)
hmm   well you could run zsnes as root but taht is dangerous
ON YOUR OWN RISK:   sudo zsnes
I will try later (my wife is calling me for diner)
Nice to talk with you... I am from Sicily.... I probably will talk with you again later.....Ciao From Catania
